---

# Issue Overview

Outline what will be addressed in this issue.

## Definition of done
Outline the tasks that need to be carried out for this issue. For each task, also create a related sub-issue.
- [ ] Task 1
- [ ] Task 2
...

### Final tasks
- [ ] Documentation: Comment code and add docstrings to functions and at the top of each file. 
- [ ] Reproducbility: Make sure code is reproducible (e.g. no hard-coded paths!!!)
- [ ] Write up in the report.
